.available-filters-preferences {
  margin-top: 10px;

  .mat-dialog-container {
    padding: 10px 22px 15px 22px;
  }
  .dialog-container {
    overflow: hidden;
    max-height: 82vh;
  }
  .header {
    border-bottom: 0.5px solid #e5e5e5;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding-bottom: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 7px;
    margin-top: 10px;
    .title {
      font-size: 16px;
      color: #333333;
    }
    .close {
      width: 20px;
      height: 20px;
      margin-left: 5px;
      cursor: pointer;
      content: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,");
    }
    .header-btn {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: flex-end;
      margin-top: -10px;
    }
    .mat-divider {
      height: 29px;
      margin: 0px 5px;
    }
  }
  .blue-button {
    font-size: 14px;
    font-weight: 500;
    background-color: #1d9fff !important;
    height: 26px;
    width: 70px;
    line-height: 18px;
    border-radius: 3px !important;
    &:disabled {
      background-color: #bdbdbd !important;
    }
  }
  .filter-container {
    border: solid 8px #e9ebed;
    border-radius: 3px;
    padding: 5px;
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    margin: 10px 5px;
    // >div{

    // }
  }
  .available-filters-chips {
    margin: 5px;
    width: 116px;
    .mat-standard-chip {
      min-height: 26px;
      &:hover::after,
      &:focus::after {
        opacity: 0;
      }
    }

    &.removeFilterChip {
      display: none;
    }
  }
  // to get the chip changed to white space when clicked and moved
  .cdk-drag-placeholder {
    opacity: 0.2;
  }
  .cdk-drop-list-dragging {
    opacity: 0.4;
  }
  .cdk-drag-animating {
    transition: transform 350ms cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1);
  }
  .cdk-drag-disabled{
    cursor: unset;
  }
}
.unset-z-index {
  z-index: 1000 !important;
}

.filter-chip {
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 10px;
  line-height: 12px;
  letter-spacing: 0.4px;
  height: 26px;
  border-radius: 5px;
  padding: 0px;
  width: 100%;
  &.active-chip {
    color: #ffffff;
    background: #37414f;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.0523656);
    .filter-pin {
      border-left: solid 1px white;
      .filter-pin-icon {
        content: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='11' height='11' viewBox='0 0 11 11' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath d='M10.597 2.70791L8.61617 0.728334C8.31805 0.430399 7.83492 0.430399 7.53653 0.728334C7.39337 0.871344 7.31298 1.06503 7.31298 1.26735C7.31298 1.41542 7.3569 1.55912 7.43633 1.68172L4.78974 3.95686C4.51721 3.83085 4.21909 3.76139 3.91281 3.76139C3.35914 3.76139 2.82798 3.98102 2.43585 4.37294C2.14996 4.65894 2.14996 5.12205 2.43585 5.40805L3.62626 6.59805L0.814453 10.5048L4.72366 7.69478L5.91408 8.88448C6.1999 9.17017 6.66395 9.17017 6.95016 8.88448C7.34163 8.4929 7.56167 7.96211 7.56167 7.40845C7.56167 7.10268 7.49256 6.80477 7.36647 6.5327L9.64338 3.88709C9.76571 3.96639 9.90914 4.01036 10.0573 4.01036C10.2597 4.01036 10.454 3.93 10.597 3.78664C10.8951 3.48868 10.8951 3.00584 10.597 2.70791Z' fill='white'/%3E%3C/svg%3E%0A");
      }
      .filter-default-icon {
        height: 7px;
        width: 7px;
        background-color: #ffffff;
        border-radius: 50%;
        display: inline-block;
      }
    }
  }
  &.inactive-chip {
    color: #37414f;
    background: #ffffff;
    border: 1px solid #37414f;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.0523656);
    .filter-pin {
      border-left: solid 1px #37414f;
      .filter-pin-icon {
        content: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='11' height='11' viewBox='0 0 11 11' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath d='M10.0428 2.26723L8.06197 0.287661C7.76386 -0.0102749 7.28072 -0.0102749 6.98233 0.287661C6.83917 0.43067 6.75879 0.624353 6.75879 0.826672C6.75879 0.974747 6.8027 1.11844 6.88213 1.24105L4.23554 3.51619C3.96301 3.39018 3.66489 3.32072 3.35861 3.32072C2.80494 3.32072 2.27378 3.54035 1.88165 3.93226C1.59576 4.21826 1.59576 4.68138 1.88165 4.96738L3.07206 6.15738L0.260254 10.0642L4.16946 7.2541L5.35988 8.44381C5.6457 8.7295 6.10975 8.7295 6.39596 8.44381C6.78743 8.05223 7.00747 7.52144 7.00747 6.96777C7.00747 6.66201 6.93836 6.3641 6.81227 6.09203L9.08919 3.44642C9.21151 3.52572 9.35494 3.56968 9.50315 3.56968C9.70553 3.56968 9.89979 3.48933 10.0428 3.34596C10.3409 3.04801 10.3409 2.56517 10.0428 2.26723Z' fill='%2337414F'/%3E%3C/svg%3E%0A");
        height: 10px;
        width: 10.01px;
      }
      .filter-default-icon {
        height: 7px;
        width: 7px;
        background-color: #37414f;
        border-radius: 50%;
        display: inline-block;
      }
      &:hover {
        .filter-unselected {
          content: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='11' height='11' viewBox='0 0 11 11' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath d='M10.0428 2.26723L8.06197 0.287661C7.76386 -0.0102749 7.28072 -0.0102749 6.98233 0.287661C6.83917 0.43067 6.75879 0.624353 6.75879 0.826672C6.75879 0.974747 6.8027 1.11844 6.88213 1.24105L4.23554 3.51619C3.96301 3.39018 3.66489 3.32072 3.35861 3.32072C2.80494 3.32072 2.27378 3.54035 1.88165 3.93226C1.59576 4.21826 1.59576 4.68138 1.88165 4.96738L3.07206 6.15738L0.260254 10.0642L4.16946 7.2541L5.35988 8.44381C5.6457 8.7295 6.10975 8.7295 6.39596 8.44381C6.78743 8.05223 7.00747 7.52144 7.00747 6.96777C7.00747 6.66201 6.93836 6.3641 6.81227 6.09203L9.08919 3.44642C9.21151 3.52572 9.35494 3.56968 9.50315 3.56968C9.70553 3.56968 9.89979 3.48933 10.0428 3.34596C10.3409 3.04801 10.3409 2.56517 10.0428 2.26723Z' fill='%2337414F'/%3E%3C/svg%3E%0A");
          cursor: pointer;
          height: 10px;
          width: 10.01px;
        }
      }
    }
    &:hover {
      color: #37414f !important;
      background-color: #ffffff !important;
    }
  }
  &.editable-chip {
    &.mat-chip.mat-standard-chip.mat-chip-disabled {
      opacity: 1;
    }
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #37414f;
    background: #ffffff;
    border: 1px dashed #37414f;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.0523656);
    .filter-name {
      input {
        border: none;
        outline: none;
        white-space: nowrap;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
      }
    }
    .filter-pin {
      border-left: dashed 1px #37414f;
      .delete-chip-icon {
        content: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='11' height='13' viewBox='0 0 11 13' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cpath d='M7.05349 4.46124C6.89422 4.46124 6.76514 4.59032         cursor: pointer;
        height: 12.31px;
        width: 10px;
      }
    }
  }
  .filter-name {
    flex: 1;
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    margin: 0px 5px;
    text-align: center;
  }
  .filter-pin {
    flex: 0 0 30px;
    text-align: center;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    height: inherit;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  .chip-container {
    // height: inherit;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    // width: 116px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
  }
}
